issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Add a convenience type for writing Parquet to memory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10667](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10667). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to the `SliceableCursor` type that provides a convenience for reading Parquet from memory, I would like to propose a type to make it convenient to write Parquet to memory. 

This is possible for clients to implement today, but seems common enough to want to provide for everyone to use.
